transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Madam, no one is asking, see, no one is registering and just they are calling just for time pass enquiries. There is no one is a serious buyer here in this platform. So I want to you to refund the amount, total amount. It's my humble request.
Executive: Sir, I'm not denying you for refund. This is what I'm trying to explain you. Nobody is denying you for refund. It's your money, you have invested and in case if you feel like it's not worth it, we are okay to provide you refund of the unused amount. But also sir, our first priority is to discuss and to resolve the problem that is coming to you.
Customer: Hello madam, actually since three four days I'm just telling same with the madam and everyone your team members also. I'm not very much dissatisfied with this one. I cannot say the total reasons also. No one is asking for sample and no one is visiting the shop. They still they are enquiring and they are asking the price and they were hanging up the call. So no one is making the payment advance also payment. So I kindly request you to refund.
Executive: calls that are being missed. Maybe you are busy at the time and you are unable to.
Customer: No, no, no, I'm not busy. I'm not busy and see I want to you see madam I don't want the discussion argument. I'm saying it's a humble request also. Kindly refund the total amount, okay.
Executive: I was going through the catalog sir. You have a very good product line and we have multiple buyers with us.
Customer: No madam, I accuse the buyers even though I'm calling they are not lifting three four times also. I'm just calling each and every call. No one is no one is like is to make the payment advance also.
Executive: What you are telling me is the buyer's nature only sir. 100% buyers do not get converted and you also know that. It's an online platform. I am not giving you any 100% assurance of conversion sir.
Customer: No, no. Finally madam, I don't want to read this with you because I'm just asking for the refund. Why don't you refund? I don't want to continue with this platform. Not satisfied. Even if I wait for not for one month, two months, even if I wait for one year also, there will be no result. I know that one. So kindly refund the amount.
Executive: Okay sir, let me check and make a complete RCA and I'll be forwarding it further and Srishti will be updating you regarding. Okay Srishti
Customer: request number complaint number everything. Sure sir. Okay. And then when can I expect the refund again? How many days?
Executive: Sir, I will be forwarding this case further and I'll be needing few approvals and post that you will be getting the refund and the whole process will be taking seven days approx working days sir.
Customer: Okay. Total 34,460 rupees madam?
Executive: Only unused amount sir.
Customer: unused amount. In case if you have used the services for 20 days, we will be deducting this amount of 20 days. Rest we will be refunding the amount.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Customer: Okay fine madam.
Executive: Okay, I'm forwarding this sir. Rest the calculation and everything will be discussed with you over email. We will be posting the communication to you.
Customer: means 17 buyers weekly you said now. Unused means did not do anything now.
Executive: But the services were live sir.
Customer: Sir okay tell me what exactly amount I will get the refund.
Executive: Yes, yes, yes. I am forwarding this and everything we will be sharing an email as well. Rest Srishti is connected with you over WhatsApp. She will be available sir. In case if you get some confusion in between, she will be helping you out with that.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Okay. Okay sir. Okay thanks.
Customer: second I can expect now sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a refund due to unsatisfactory buyleads.

- No sample requests or shop visits.

- Enquiries are just for price and then hang up.



Resolution:

- Executive assured refund of unused amount.

- RCA will be done and forwarded for approval.

- Srishti will provide updates.

- Calculation will be discussed over email.



Next Steps: 

- Refund process will take approximately seven working days.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, rca
